vernac_cmds: Definition rooted_fun (s1 s2 : Site) (m : Message) := match m with | copy => if eq_site_dec s1 s0 then 1%Z else 0%Z | dec => if eq_site_dec s2 s0 then 1%Z else 0%Z | inc_dec s3 => if eq_site_dec s3 s0 then if eq_site_dec s2 owner then 1%Z else 0%Z else 0%Z end.
Definition rooted (s1 s2 : Site) (q : queue Message) := reduce Message (rooted_fun s1 s2) q.
Definition sigma_rooted (bm : Bag_of_message) := sigma2_table Site LS LS (queue Message) rooted bm.

Lemma sigma_rooted_post_message : forall (m : Message) (s0 s1 s2 : Site) (b : Bag_of_message), s0 <> owner -> sigma_rooted s0 (Post_message Message m b s1 s2) = (sigma_rooted s0 b + rooted_fun s0 s1 s2 m)%Z.

Lemma rooted_first_out : forall (s0 s1 s2 : Site) (q : queue Message) (m : Message), first Message q = value Message m -> rooted s0 s1 s2 (first_out Message q) = (rooted s0 s1 s2 q - rooted_fun s0 s1 s2 m)%Z.

Lemma sigma_rooted_collect_message : forall (m : Message) (s0 s1 s2 : Site) (b : Bag_of_message), first Message (b s1 s2) = value Message m -> s0 <> owner -> sigma_rooted s0 (Collect_message Message b s1 s2) = (sigma_rooted s0 b - rooted_fun s0 s1 s2 m)%Z.
rewrite (rooted_first_out s0 s1 s2 (b s1 s2) m).
Lemma rooted_fun_positive_or_null : forall (s0 x y : Site) (a : Message), (rooted_fun s0 x y a >= 0)%Z.
Lemma rooted_positive_or_null : forall (s0 x y : Site) (q : queue Message), (rooted s0 x y q >= 0)%Z.

Axiom sigma_rooted_change_queue : forall (s0 s1 s2 : Site) (b : Bag_of_message) (q : queue Message), s0 <> owner -> b s1 owner = input Message dec (input Message (inc_dec s2) q) -> sigma_rooted s0 (change_queue (queue Message) b s1 owner q) = (sigma_rooted s0 b - rooted_fun s0 s1 owner dec - rooted_fun s0 s1 owner (inc_dec s2))%Z.
Lemma invariant2_init : forall s0 : Site, st config_init s0 = sigma_rooted s0 (bm config_init).

Lemma invariant2_ind : forall s0 : Site, s0 <> owner -> forall (c : Config) (t : class_trans c), legal c -> st c s0 = sigma_rooted s0 (bm c) -> st (transition c t) s0 = sigma_rooted s0 (bm (transition c t)).
intro; unfold update_table in |- *; rewrite elsewhere.
intros; unfold update_table in |- *; rewrite elsewhere.
case (eq_queue_dec x s1 x0 s2); intro.
rewrite H4; rewrite H5; rewrite that_queue.
cut (rooted s0 s1 s2 (append Message q1 q2) = rooted s0 s1 s2 (append Message q3 q4)).
Lemma invariant2 : forall (c0 : Config) (s0 : Site), legal c0 -> s0 <> owner -> st c0 s0 = sigma_rooted s0 (bm c0).
Lemma positive_st : forall (c : Config) (s0 s5 : Site), s0 <> owner -> legal c -> In_queue Message (inc_dec s0) (bm c s5 owner) -> (st c s0 > 0)%Z.
intros c s0 s5 H HA.

command: rewrite (rooted_first_out s0 s1 s2 (b s1 s2) m).
intro; unfold update_table in |- *; rewrite elsewhere.
intros; unfold update_table in |- *; rewrite elsewhere.
case (eq_queue_dec x s1 x0 s2); intro.
rewrite H4; rewrite H5; rewrite that_queue.
cut (rooted s0 s1 s2 (append Message q1 q2) = rooted s0 s1 s2 (append Message q3 q4)).
intros c s0 s5 H HA.
